titles.title: Lord, Let Your Light, Light Of Your Face

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, let Your light,
Light of Your face,
Shine on us.
Lord, let Your light,
Light of Your face,
Shine on us.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That we may be saved,
That we may have life,
To find our way in the darkest night.
Let Your light shine on us.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, let Your grace,
Grace from Your hand,
Fall on us.
Lord, let Your grace,
Grace from Your hand,
Fall on us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
That we may be saved,
That we may have life,
To find our way in the darkest night.
Let Your grace fall on us.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord, let Your love,
Love with no end,
Come over us.
Lord, let Your love,
Love with no end,
Come over us.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
That we may be saved,
That we may have life,
To find our way in the darkest night.
Let Your love come over us.
Let Your light shine on us.
